name: Mimikyu
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

attacks.name: Haunt
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Choose a random card from your opponent’s hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.
